title: BEAUTIFUL 2BR 2ND FL APT IN A PRIVATE HOUSE
neighborhood: Newbold Ave near Castle Hill Ave
posting_body: ['Redesigned and fully renovated, this apartment has gorgeous hardwood floors, an open floor plan living area with a skylight, kitchen, bathroom, and lots of closet space.', 'Come home to a two-bedroom unit on the upper floor that gets tons of natural light and is private, safe, and peaceful.', 'Today is your lucky day, the rent includes HEAT, HOT WATER, GAS, and ELECTRICITY!', 'This special apartment is two short blocks from Castle Hill', 'No. 6 train station and a half-hour ride to Manhattan and is part of a walking or biking neighborhood just one block from many shops, restaurants, and neighborhood amenities.', ' Cats and small dogs are ok.', 'This is a MUST SEE, one-of-a-kind apartment.', 'Well qualified applicants should text 917.693.5714 for more info and the open house schedule.', 'Text ONLY, no calls.', ' Thank you.']
